AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa: Defendant who pleaded guilty to charges of illegal re-entry after deportation, native and citizen of Mexico
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court for the Sou: Court responsible for imposing sentences in accordance with federal guidelines, considering factors such as the nature and circumstances of the offense and the history and characteristics of the defendant.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Rearraignment of Rogelio Valero-De La Ro: Court proceeding where Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa pleaded guilty and waived certain rights, led to his sentencing
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Plea Agreement between Rogelio Valero-De: Agreement outlining terms of guilty plea, including waiver of right to collaterally attack conviction or sentence
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Indictment against Rogelio Valero-De La: Formal charges of illegal re-entry after deportation against the defendant, led to his rearraignment and plea agreement
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Sentencing Commission: Agency responsible for establishing federal sentencing guidelines, including considerations under fast track programs
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.70 to 87 months: Advisory guideline range for Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa's sentence, considered in his sentencing
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Report and Recommendation to the United: Document recommending acceptance of guilty plea and entry of final judgment of guilt, based on Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa's understanding of the plea agreement
